modName: Steel Crossbow and Crossbow Bolt Recolor

descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
This is a simple recolor that replaces the texture and normal maps of the Steel Crossbow and bolts to make them look more like something you would see on a medieval battlefield. There are three different versions; one with vanilla colored steel, one with darker steel hardware and vanilla colored steel bow (pictured), and one with darkened steel hardware and bow. each recolor is a separate file so pick one or the bow textures from the file and install it.

REQUIREMENTS: Dawngaurd

INSTALLATION:
I'm not sure if this mod works with NMM because I don't use it. Just drag and drop into your Skyrim data folder.

PERMISSION:
You may use this file in your own mod, just be sure to give credit where credit is due. =)

CREDITS:
As alwayse thank to Bathesda for an awesome game/DLCs and their show of support for the modding community.. and the textures edited in this mod.

ADDITIONAL CREDITS...
The armor in the pictures can be found here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42169/?

And the hood is from an immersion mod called Wet and Cold, here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563/?

Or here for just the hoods: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3201/?

The widget in the upper left hand corner of the screen is from here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44091/?

OTHER MODS BY ME:

Scimitar Retexture: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46552/?

Steel Arrow Retexture - Black and White Feathers: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52645/?
author: Mythos214
